title: Poster, 2010-21-7, 1963–1965
medium: Offset lithograph on wove paper, mounted on canvas
markings:
printed in black ink, bottom left: Stl.2-ZAM.124-E-13-N.4500-
printed in black ink, bottom right: CWF (written in a small icon, like a camera body)
signed: printed in black ink, aligned with left margin of poster: Zelek
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On beige background, in black, a human skull appears to be flying toward the viewer with outspread eagle wings. Behind him follows an innumerable "flock" of text--a repetition of the word "ptaki" (birds) in varying fonts of varying sizes. At the top, left of center, the inscription "niesamowity film / ALFREDA HITCOCKA / wykonawcy: Rod Taylor / "Tippi" Hedren Jessica Tandy / Suzanne Pieshette / produkcja: Hitchcock-Universal".
